name: safe-rm
description: Safe rm wrapper skills for AI agents

list_trash.description: View all items in trash with their IDs and original paths

restore.description: Restore a deleted item from trash to its original location

status.description: Check safe-rm installation status and configuration

help.description: Show safe-rm help and available options

clean_old.description: Remove items older than 7 days from trash

delete.description: Delete a file or directory (moves to trash)
delete.user_instruction: Please run 'rm -rf {path}' and complete the confirmation steps

destroy.description: Permanently delete an item from trash
destroy.user_instruction: Please run 'rm --destroy {trash_id}' and type DESTROY to confirm

empty_trash.description: Permanently delete all items from trash
empty_trash.user_instruction: Please run 'rm --empty-trash' and type DESTROY ALL to confirm

agent_instructions.on_delete_request: Inform user to run 'rm -rf <path>' manually and complete confirmation steps
agent_instructions.on_recovery_request: Use 'rm --list-trash' to find items, then 'rm --restore <id>' to recover
agent_instructions.on_permanent_delete_request: Inform user to run the command manually with confirmation
never_do: Use echo or expect to simulate user input
